segments.text: I can't help but feel a little disgusted by this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring onto the floor, unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a terrible waste, and it's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's neutrality in the face of this deluge is baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, taking advantage of the distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect example of a household spiraling out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet floor is a huge slip hazard for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just seems so careless, so utterly neglected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the mold that could grow from all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes me want to step in and fix things myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a portrayal of domestic disarray that's quite upsetting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene here before it gets even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope someone notices the issues soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
